articles.title: Cleveland Cavaliers’ playoff hopes disappear with 120-115 loss to Orlando Magic, will tackle play-in tourname - cleveland.com
articles.description: The Cavs started hot, outscoring the Magic, 14-3, in the opening minutes. But they couldn’t sustain it.
articles.content:
ORLANDO, Fla. -- The Orlando Magic made the Cleveland Cavaliers playoff hopes disappear Tuesday night.
Given what was at stake, with so few games remaining in the regular season, clinging to hope fo… [+5471 chars]
